name: Granblue Fantasy Enhancements
description: Allows the customization of the game's layout and responsive behavior. > Previews album <

user.name: MetalTxus
user.about: Front-end developer who mainly enjoys watching anime, reading manga, playing games and listening to music (metal and rock mostly).

additional_info: Required game settings: * Side Bar Type: Slide Customization settings legend: 1. (Center content) Submenu not accounted for (see album screenshot) 2. (Center popups) Warning: might make some elements inaccessible depending on the device's size 3. (Fit crew chat) Fits crew chat in the available space (requires Center content) 4. (Fix header menu position) Keeps header menu in place when scrolling • Optional: hides contained banners (use when they won't fit the screen) 5. (Sort summons) Sort summons by uncap level 6. (Rearrange co-op room) Put room buttons on top 7. (Compact summons) Compacts summon cards in the selection page (see album screenshot) 8. (Compact lists) Show 5 items per row instead of 4 (grids end up being 5x4 instead of 4x5, saving some scrolling) 9. (Hide crystal count) Hides crystal count from #mypage and #profile in an attempt to stop you from impulsively wasting instead of saving 10. (Hide quest commentary) Hides Vyrn's commentary on the summon selection screen Screenshots imgur album Changelog: 2019.11.07 • Fixed centering setting after sidebar was removed. 2019.09.19 • Wrote compact lists style from the ground up. Should now no longer require updates to keep working with changes. 2019.04.20 • Added "sort summons" (by uncap level) setting. 2019.04.11 • Added "compact lists" setting. 2018.07.19 • Fixed cerulean sparks card not being available. • Minor fixes. 2018.03.19 • Fixed victory text on compact raid buttons. 2018.03.13 • Upgraded "compact raids" option (see album screenshot).
